seedGroups.name: Elaiosomes
seedGroups.description: Elaiosomes are “ant candy” attached to the seeds. Ants are strong and motivated, able to quickly carry the candy back to their home and tossing the heavy “candy wrapper” (seeds) into their compost piles.

species.description: Elaiosomes. Flowers are maroon-red petals around black anthers. Leaves are mottled shades of green. Common in woodlands & savannas; finding these in prairies typically indicates a historic woodland. Trillium capsules start to degrade when ripe, but not as mushy as wild ginger.
